reviewText: More of a travelogue of the area than an insightful view of Faulkner and his writings.

I have several of these dvds. They are very informative and nice and short so you don't get too bored. They provide great information about some of the worlds greatest writers. I highly recommend them.
Probably one of the most boring biographies ever put together - it was more of a travelog of Faulkner's early life and where he lived than information about his work.

This documentary is a concise and somewhat thorough biography of William Faulkner. It is ideal for teachers who want to give students some background information on him before teaching one of his novels or short stories.
